data.title: Mobile Data Sheet
data.meta_description: Mobile Data Sheet - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. www.saba.com Data Sheet Elevate Engagement and Productivity with Mobile Talent Management Smart phones and tablets are quickly becoming the computing platform of choice. Mobile access accelerates and improves talent processes. With anytime, anywhere access, your employees have an easier time learning, working together, and even keeping their goals up to date. Managers can review and approve requests, provide feedback, and coach their team while on the go. Quicker responses and greater dialogue lead to higher employee engagement and productivity. Saba Mobile With Saba Mobile, Intelligent Talent Management is available anytime, anywhere. Employees can learn, collaborate, ﬁnd experts and information, crowd source questions, and manage their goals. Managers can check their team’s progress, provide feedback, hold team meetings, conduct interviews, and approve requisitions and offers. Benefits • Accelerate learning, recruiting and goal management with anytime, anywhere access • Just-in-time learning and performance support • Improve employee engagement and customer satisfaction with shortened response times • Secure access to corporate information and resources Features • Mobile Learning • Communities, discussions and experts • Virtual classroom, webinars, meetings, and recordings • TIM, The Intelligent Mentor • Mobile Recruiting • Goal management • Coaching and development tools • Enterprise grade security • Native Mobile Applications for iOS and Android

2. 2 Data Sheet > Saba Mobile Mobile Learning • My Learning Plan: Personal listing of all courses, including completed, in-progress and upcoming courses • Search, Browse, and Filter the Catalog: Find, register, and launch a course from your mobile app • Virtual Learning: Learners can join virtual classrooms or launch session recordings with one click directly from the Saba Cloud app. Attendance data including time spent is automatically recorded. • Standards Support: AICC, Tin Can and SCORM including multi-module content • Universal Content Viewer: View standards-based as well as informal content, such as Word docs, PDFs, videos, and externally hosted content, such as Skillsoft • Checklists: Easy and flexible way for users to support On the Job Training and conduct observational assessments My Learning Plan • Online and Offline Access: When connected online, Saba Cloud mobile users can either consume formal and informal content or download the content for offline viewing. • Synchronized Learning: Start on your PC, continue on your phone, and finish on your tablet at home. Saba automatically tracks your progress. • On-demand Playback: Recorded sessions and courses with active tests and assessments • Certification: Track course completions and learning progress • Compliance Tracking: Results of learning attendance and assessment reported back • Message Center: Receive and send notifications of actionable requests and private messages

3. 3 Data Sheet > Saba Mobile Communities, Discussions and Experts • Just in Time Learning: Search and filter to find content and experts in the moment of need • Crowd Sourcing: Ask questions to communities of experts • Social Learning: Support formal learning with groups and discussions • Ideation: Suggest and vote on ideas • TIM, The Intelligent Mentor: Recommends classes, content and experts Mobile Talent Management • Goals: Set, track and update goals • Recruiting: Conduct interviews, discuss candidates; approve requisitions and offers • Manager Dashboard: Track team members progress with alerts for overdue items • Coaching: Recognize achievement with badges, message employees and connect via web and video meetings My Team: Coaching on the go Access Communities and Discussions
